General.Name: SCHUMAG Aktiengesellschaft
General.Description: SCHUMAG Aktiengesellschaft manufactures and sells metal precision elements and parts in Germany. The company serves industrial, medicine, and engine, as well as e-mobility and after-market industries. It also exports its products to approximately 20 countries. SCHUMAG Aktiengesellschaft was founded in 1830 and is based in Aachen, Germany.

1.Name: Rasim  Alii
1.Title: Head of Production & Member of Supervisory Board
